Text: Stressed with Debt We Can Help Consolidate all your debt into ONE EASY monthly payment We will help you Eliminate interest charges Waive late fee charges Improve your credit rating And best of all lower your monthly payments by and KEEP MORE CASH IN YOUR POCKET Take just minute to complete our Credit Card Consolidation Form and one of our experienced professional consultants will contact you There is no obligation and our service is fast and free All information is kept strictly confidential Since you have received this message you have either responded to one of our offers in the past or your address has been registered with us If you wish to be removed please reply mailtosubjectremove
